document_name: Government Urgency Ordinance on the Environmental Fund, 196/ 2005
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/ROU/2005/ROU-2005-12-30-Government Urgency Ordinance on the Environmental Fund, 196_ 2005_b145f165cb134197030e970016c29d6b.pdf
document_description: The law provided a legal framework to set up a special fund as a pro-active measure outside the budget to achieve the objective of the National Action Plan for environmental protection.
